page.title: 05LEISURE IN CLEETHORPES
page.content: Cleethorpes has a large variety of {fashion shops}like 'Jinty', 'Sonia' and 'Limelights' where girls spend a lot of time.Young people like to stroll around the{arcades}like 'Arthurs','Smithys' and the 'Empire'. On Saturday evenings Alexandra Road and Kinsway are packed with young people drinking in the{pubs}like The Dolphin,Strides and Deans (which also has a disco).There are many {restaurants,}the most famous being 'Steels'.Some of them are Chinese and some Italian.There are quite a lot of {clubs;}The RAFA,the Liberal,the Waverley and the Royal Navy.There are 14 fish and chip shops.For people who like their hair nice there are lots of {hairdressers.}Lots of women like to go to the{bingo}at the 'Ritz' and the 'Clifton'.
